channel.title: How do i get my max-stats on MEGAscape?
channel.description: I cant find out how to get 99 or 135 (not sure what the highest is) on a MEGAscape. please help me... ive tryed ::maxall, but it wont work...

item.title: How do i get my max-stats on MEGAscape?
item.dc:creator: @mariuswb mariuswb
item.description:
@mariuswb wrote:

ty…
No Talking About Rep

[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 01:28:23 PM[/size][hr]i just find

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxout") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(48000000, 0); addSkillXP(48000000, 1); addSkillXP(48000000, 2); addSkillXP(48000000, 3); addSkillXP(48000000, 4); addSkillXP(48000000, 5); addSkillXP(48000000, 6); addSkillXP(48000000, 7); addSkillXP(48000000, 8); addSkillXP(48000000, 9); addSkillXP(48000000, 10); addSkillXP(48000000, 11); addSkillXP(48000000, 12); addSkillXP(48000000, 13); addSkillXP(48000000, 14); addSkillXP(48000000, 15); addSkillXP(48000000, 16); addSkillXP(48000000, 17); addSkillXP(48000000, 18); addSkillXP(48000000, 19); addSkillXP(48000000, 20); addSkillXP(48000000, 21); addSkillXP(48000000, 22); addSkillXP(48000000, 23); addSkillXP(48000000, 24); sendMessage("Y0U CH3AT1NG BAST3RD."); }

item.title: How do i get my max-stats on MEGAscape?
item.dc:creator: @D_A_N D A N
item.description:
@D_A_N wrote:

add a command :

[CODE] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“stats”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(20000000, 0);
addSkillXP(20000000, 1);
addSkillXP(20000000, 2);
addSkillXP(20000000, 3);
addSkillXP(20000000, 4);
addSkillXP(20000000, 5);
addSkillXP(20000000, 6);
addSkillXP(20000000, 7);
addSkillXP(20000000, 8);
addSkillXP(20000000, 9);
addSkillXP(20000000, 10);
addSkillXP(20000000, 11);
addSkillXP(20000000, 12);
addSkillXP(20000000, 13);
addSkillXP(20000000, 14);
addSkillXP(20000000, 15);
addSkillXP(20000000, 16);
addSkillXP(20000000, 17);
addSkillXP(20000000, 18);
addSkillXP(20000000, 19);
addSkillXP(20000000, 20);
addSkillXP(20000000, 21);
addSkillXP(20000000, 22);
addSkillXP(20000000, 23);
addSkillXP(20000000, 24);

}
[/CODE]

Will give you 20m xp in each skill, change xp if you want.
